plays.text: Goal scored by Alexei Ponikarovsky assisted by Nik Antropov
Penalty to Wade Belak 2 minutes for Holding Tommy Albelin
Penalty to Brian Gionta 2 minutes for Tripping Nik Antropov
Penalty to Paul Martin 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Tomas Kaberle assisted by Jason Allison AND Bryan McCabe

Penalty to Alexei Ponikarovsky 2 minutes for Holding Colin White
Goal scored by Brian Gionta assisted by Jamie Langenbrunner AND Brian Rafalski
Goal scored by John Madden assisted by Jamie Langenbrunner AND David Hale
Penalty to Clarke Wilm 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Scott Gomez 2 minutes for Roughing Mats Sundin
Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Roughing Scott Gomez
Goal scored by Chad Kilger assisted by Nik Antropov AND Andy Wozniewski
Penalty to David Hale 2 minutes for Crosschecking Nik Antropov
